movie_title: Cases of retailer-related offences involving e-bikes drop
introduction: Retailer-related offences involving power-assisted bicycles (PABs) or e-bikes fell by more than thre

vocabulary.definition: illegal acts; breaches of a law or rule
vocabulary.example: The company was fined for committing various offenses against environmental regulations.
The airline has stringent security measures in place to ensure passenger safety.

vocabulary.definition: having a good reputation; respected and trusted
vocabulary.example: It is important to buy products from reputable brands to guarantee quality.

vocabulary.definition: having no legal force or effect; invalid
vocabulary.example: The contract was declared void due to a breach of its terms.

vocabulary.definition: changes or alterations made to something
vocabulary.example: The car enthusiast made several modifications to improve the vehicle's performance.

vocabulary.definition: completely surrounded or covered by something
vocabulary.example: The house was engulfed in flames within minutes of the fire starting.
